## Description {#details}

BBInfo - Per-basic block information used internally by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdaterimpl">SSAUpdaterImpl</a>.

The predecessors of each block are cached here since <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab5b46bfb4c91a29504b08dacfeb04a6c">pred&#95;iterator</a> is slow and we need to iterate over the blocks at least a few times.

Definition at line 43 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h">SSAUpdaterImpl.h</a>.
